title: BOQO Glass Coffee Cups Set of 4, 8oz Double Walled Insulated Drinking Glass Coffee Mugs with Handle,Perfect for Latte, Cappuccinos, Tea Bag, Juice (240ml Water Glasses)
features: Safe Material -- It is hand-blown from heat-resistant and anti-condensation borosilicate glass, which is lighter and more durable than ordinary glass. The appearance is exquisite and more transparent. Suitable for daily use and easy to clean.

Double Wall Design -- creates a floating optical effect. Its acceptable temperature is -20C to 150"C, which can maintain the temperature of the beverage for a long time while protecting your hands from burns.

Multifunctional Use -- This double wall coffee cup is perfect for hot or cold drinks: tea, coffee, latte, cappuccino, macchiato, smoothies and juices,etc. It can be used for family gatherings or entertaining guests. You can fully enjoy the deliciousness of coffee, tea, juice and other drinks.
THE PERFECT GIFT -- no matter the occasion, it is a great choice for coffee, espresso or tea lovers in your life. A cup of coffee or tea every morning and evening is a wonderful treat for anyone.
Customer satisfaction is the most important. If you are dissatisfied with our products or damaged during transportation, please contact us immediately and we will give you a best solution!
